title: 32. Python in Computer-Aided Drug Discovery
summary:
Computational tools are an integral part of the modern drug-discovery
process. At NIBR, we leverage Python to great success in all stages of
drug discovery. Not only can we easily deploy new tools to our
scientists easily using tools like Django, but Python's approachability
(that "fits your brain" character) allows scientists with no programming
experience to start coding themselves!
